H0.text: Who was Britain’s first female Olympic boxing Gold medal winner. Savannah Marshall

H1.text: Who was Britain’s first female Olympic boxing Gold medal winner. Chantelle Cameron

H2.text: Who was Britain’s first female Olympic boxing Gold medal winner. Natasha Jonas

H3.text: Who was Britain’s first female Olympic boxing Gold medal winner. Nicola Adams

A4.text: She became the first female boxer to become an Olympic champion after winning gold at London 2012.

A5.text: In the 2012 Summer Olympics, Adams defeated Mary Kom from India in the Flyweight semi-final.
